        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-preview"
    logic_state="tab-preview-1"
    alignment_x="stretch"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-preview-1">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab One</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur

                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-preview-2">

        <Tab.Section>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.

<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let logic_state = "tab-logic-state-1";
</script>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (logic_state = "tab-logic-state-1")}
>
    Select Tab One
</Button>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (logic_state = "tab-logic-state-2")}
>
    Select Tab Two
</Button>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (logic_state = "tab-logic-state-3")}
>
    Select Tab Three

    logic_name="tab-logic-state"
    alignment_x="stretch"

>

<script>
    import {Heading, Tab} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-palette"
    logic_state="tab-palette-default"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-default">
        <Tab.Label>Tab DEFAULT</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab DEFAULT Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-accent">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab ACCENT
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab ACCENT Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-neutral">
        <Tab.Label palette="neutral">
            Tab NEUTRAL
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab NEUTRAL Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-dark">
        <Tab.Label palette="dark">Tab DARK</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab DARK Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-light">
        <Tab.Label palette="light">
            Tab LIGHT
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab LIGHT Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-alert">

            Tab ALERT
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab ALERT Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-affirmative">

            Tab AFFIRMATIVE
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab AFFIRMATIVE Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-informative">

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab INFORMATIVE Content</Heading>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-negative">

            Tab NEGATIVE

        <Tab.Section>

        </Tab.Section>

</Tab.Container>

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container alignment_x="stretch">
    <Tab.Anchor
        current="page"
        href="#"
        palette="accent"
    >
        Tab One
    </Tab.Anchor>

    <Tab.Section>
        <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien.
        </Text>
    </Tab.Section>

    <Tab.Anchor href="#" palette="accent">
        Tab Two
    </Tab.Anchor>

    <Tab.Section>...</Tab.Section>

    <Tab.Anchor href="#" palette="accent">
        Tab Three
    </Tab.Anchor>

    <Tab.Section>...</Tab.Section>
</Tab.Container>
snippets.title: Tab Anchor

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
        Transition,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-transition"
    logic_state="tab-transition-1"
    alignment_x="stretch"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-transition-1">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab One</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-transition-2">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab Two</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Tab Two Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-transition-3">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab Three
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Tab Three Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>
</Tab.Container>
snippets.title: Tab Transitions

data.text:
Tab NOTE : Introduced feature in v0.3.1. Tab Components are used for turning what would be multi-page content, into a block of multiple views with a set of radio buttons to toggle between. Tab One Tab One Content Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis sapien. Tab Two Tab Two Content Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis sapien. Tab Three Tab Three Content Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis sapien. Imports Logic State NOTE : Introduced feature in v0.5.2. WARNING : This feature is only available in Javascript-enabled clients. You can manually choose which Component is active via the logic_state property. Tab One Tab One Content Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt non. Orci varius natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Tab Two Tab Two Content Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci. Orci varius natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Palette You can change the color palette of the Tab radio buttons via the palette property. Tab DEFAULT Tab DEFAULT Content Tab ACCENT Tab ACCENT Content Tab NEUTRAL Tab NEUTRAL Content Tab DARK Tab DARK Content Tab LIGHT Tab LIGHT Content Tab ALERT Tab ALERT Content Tab AFFIRMATIVE Tab AFFIRMATIVE Content Tab INFORMATIVE Tab INFORMATIVE Content Tab NEGATIVE Tab NEGATIVE Content Sizing You can alter how large each Tab radio button should be via the sizing property.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-palette-background-bold
Tab.Container.description: Controls the default RGB color value used for border-color / color.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-border-width
Tab.Container.description: Controls the border-width used for button underline.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-gap
Tab.Container.description: Controls the spacing gap between child elements, e.g. icons.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-padding-x
Tab.Container.description: Controls the X-Axis padding-left / padding-right used.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-padding-y
Tab.Container.description: Controls the X-Axis padding-bottom / padding-top used.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-disabled-opacity
Tab.Container.description: Controls the opacity used when disabled.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-item-focus-color-opacity
Tab.Container.description: Controls the background opacity used when focused.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-section-border-opacity
Tab.Container.description: Controls the border-color opacity used for tab track.

Tab.Container.name: --tab-section-border-width
Tab.Container.description: Controls the border-width used for tab track.

Tab.Container.name: logic_name
Tab.Container.description: Sets the form name attribute in a Svelte Context for child Tab.Label radio buttons to group as.

Tab.Container.name: logic_state
Tab.Container.description: Controls the currently active Tab.Label radio button via a Svelte Context .

Tab.Container.name: alignment_x
Tab.Container.description: Adjusts where the Tab.Anchor / Tab.Label radio buttons are, along the horizontal axis.

Tab.Container.name: sizing
Tab.Container.description: Sets the size of each Tab.Anchor / Tab.Label radio buttons.

Tab.Group.name: logic_id
Tab.Group.description: Sets the element id attribute in a Svelte Context for child Tab.Group / Tab.Label Components to group as.

Tab.Anchor.name: current
Tab.Anchor.description: Changes the aria-current attribute, telling screen readers how to handle the link.

Tab.Anchor.name: href
Tab.Anchor.description: Changes the URL that Tab.Anchor navigates end-users to when clicked.

Tab.Anchor.name: rel
Tab.Anchor.description: Sets how the Tab.Anchor relates to the current page, see MDN for more information.

Tab.Anchor.name: target
Tab.Anchor.description: Sets the target of the Tab.Anchor being navigated, see MDN for more information.

Tab.Section.name: loading
Tab.Section.description: When the property is set and the Tab.Section view is not active, the child content is not rendered to DOM.

data.render:
NOTE: Introduced feature in v0.3.1.

Tab Components are used for turning what would be multi-page content, into a block of multiple views with a set of radio buttons to toggle between.

<script>
    import {
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-preview"
    logic_state="tab-preview-1"
    alignment_x="stretch"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-preview-1">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab One</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-preview-2">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab Two</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab Two Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-preview-3">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab Three
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab Three Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>
</Tab.Container>

Imports

<script>
    import {Tab} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const {
        Container,
        Anchor,
        Label,
        Group,
        Section,
    } = Tab;
</script>

Logic State

NOTE: Introduced feature in v0.5.2.

WARNING: This feature is only available in Javascript-enabled clients.

You can manually choose which <Tab.Section> Component is active via the logic_state property.

<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let logic_state = "tab-logic-state-1";
</script>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (logic_state = "tab-logic-state-1")}
>
    Select Tab One
</Button>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (logic_state = "tab-logic-state-2")}
>
    Select Tab Two
</Button>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (logic_state = "tab-logic-state-3")}
>
    Select Tab Three
</Button>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-logic-state"
    alignment_x="stretch"
    bind:logic_state
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-logic-state-1">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab One</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien. Sed pellentesque
                rutrum tellus, in iaculis dolor
                tincidunt non. Orci varius natoque
                penatibus et magnis dis parturient
                montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-logic-state-2">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab Two</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab Two Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien. Sed pellentesque
                rutrum tellus, in iaculis dolor
                tincidunt non. Orci varius natoque
                penatibus et magnis dis parturient
                montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-logic-state-3">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab Three
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab Three Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien. Sed pellentesque
                rutrum tellus, in iaculis dolor
                tincidunt non. Orci varius natoque
                penatibus et magnis dis parturient
                montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>
</Tab.Container>

Palette

You can change the color palette of the Tab radio buttons via the palette property.

<script>
    import {Heading, Tab} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-palette"
    logic_state="tab-palette-default"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-default">
        <Tab.Label>Tab DEFAULT</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab DEFAULT Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-accent">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab ACCENT
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab ACCENT Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-neutral">
        <Tab.Label palette="neutral">
            Tab NEUTRAL
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Heading>Tab NEUTRAL Content</Heading>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-palette-dark">
        <Tab.Label palette="dark">Tab DARK</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>

        </Tab.Section>

    </Tab.Group>
</Tab.Container>

You can alter how large each Tab radio button should be via the sizing property.

        Heading,

    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

Loading

USAGE: Use your Browser's devtools to observe this feature.

You can customize the slot loading behavior of individual Tab.Section Components to not render their children, via the loading property.

<script>
    import {
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-loading"
    logic_state="tab-lazy-1"
    alignment_x="stretch"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-lazy-1">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab One</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section loading="lazy">
            <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-lazy-2">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab Two</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section loading="lazy">
            <Heading>Tab Two Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-lazy-3">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab Three
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section loading="lazy">
            <Heading>Tab Three Content</Heading>

            <Text>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
                adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur
                orci. Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae
                convallis sapien.
            </Text>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>
</Tab.Container>

Anchor

You can substitute Tab.Label for Tab.Anchor to support per-page tabbed views.

<script>
    import {
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container alignment_x="stretch">
    <Tab.Anchor
        current="page"
        href="#"
        palette="accent"
    >
        Tab One
    </Tab.Anchor>

    <Tab.Section>
        <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien.
        </Text>
    </Tab.Section>

    <Tab.Anchor href="#" palette="accent">
        Tab Two
    </Tab.Anchor>

    <Tab.Section>...</Tab.Section>

    <Tab.Anchor href="#" palette="accent">
        Tab Three
    </Tab.Anchor>

    <Tab.Section>...</Tab.Section>
</Tab.Container>

Transitions

You can use Transition Components to provide fancy switching animations.

<script>
    import {
        Heading,
        Tab,
        Text,
        Transition,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Tab.Container
    logic_name="tab-transition"
    logic_state="tab-transition-1"
    alignment_x="stretch"
>
    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-transition-1">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab One</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Tab One Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-transition-2">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">Tab Two</Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Tab Two Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>

    <Tab.Group logic_id="tab-transition-3">
        <Tab.Label palette="accent">
            Tab Three
        </Tab.Label>

        <Tab.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Tab Three Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Tab.Section>
    </Tab.Group>
</Tab.Container>
